comment: Aerodynamics is a tough subject but Professor Coates is a great teacher. I was in his office all the time asking him questions and getting help. He was always very knowledgeable. There were online quizzes. occasional homework, and tests. Be aware that you will have to work very hard for an A. He gave like 7 A's out to a class 50.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: He was not a good professor at all. Rambles the entire class regarding just the math concepts with not much context to how it applies to theory. If you try to get help from him to try to understand something better, he loses his patience immediately and gives you a condescending attitude. Avoid if possible for sure, not a helpful professor at all
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: I'm a studious person and not typically one to leave negative reviews, but I would recommend avoiding this professor. He has a very condescending attitude, he rarely replied to emails, and he dropped a major group assignment on us and gave us only a few days to complete it, then he took over two months to grade it. Super tough grader too.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Tough grader

comment: Dr. Coates is really cool, but be advised Aerodynamics is kind of an intense course. The material can be a little abstract and hard to keep up with but he really goes the extra mile to make sure you get it. If you don't understand, email him and go by his office and he'll make sure that you get it before you leave. Stand up guy, funny too.
rating_tags: Respected--Accessible outside class--Graded by few things

comment: Dr. Coates is an amazing professor for Aerodynamics! He was very inspirational. He stressed to us that getting an answer in a box was not nearly as important as understanding the process of what you're doing. Lectures and tests are largely theoretical, lots of derivations etc. If you want to do well, show up and read the book. Good Luck!
Just do yourself a favor and stay away from this guy.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Test heavy

comment: Lectures were very theoretical, we spent a lot of class deriving equations. If you like nothing but theory & minimal application this class is for you. Quizzes were online & werent too challenging. Tests were very confusing & very difficult, average was in the 60s. Coates is cool, but the class isn't fun
